name: Tushar Panchal

projects.title: Multi-Application Deployment on AWS EC2
projects.description: This project demonstrates the successful deployment of React, Angular, and Spring Boot applications on AWS EC2 instances. Each application is configured to operate under different deployment scenarios.

aboutpara: I am a highly motivated and skilled DevOps Engineer with a passion for creating efficient and scalable solutions. I have good knowledge in Cloud Platforms, DevOps Tools, and deploying applications with a focus on automation and optimization. My experience spans working on projects involving React application deployment on AWS EC2 and Spring Boot application deployment on AWS EKS. Currently, I am working as a DevOps Engineer at BUOPSO Pvt Ltd, where I have implemented CI/CD pipelines and managed Kubernetes clusters. Previously, I interned at Factacy.ai, contributing to the deployment and optimization of cloud-based applications. With a strong foundation in Mechanical Engineering from MDU Jhajjar, I am well-equipped to tackle complex technical challenges and deliver world-class solutions.

resume.description: I'm a DevOps Engineer with experience in cloud platforms, DevOps tools, and CI/CD pipelines.

experiences.position: DevOps Engineer at BUOPSO Pvt Ltd

experiences.bullets: Worked on React application deployment on AWS EC2, Worked on Spring Boot application deployment on AWS EKS
